bill.title: Bulletproof Vests Revolving Fund Program; create.
bill.description: An Act To Create The Bulletproof Vests Revolving Fund Program To Be Administered By The Department Of Public Safety For Local Law Enforcement Agencies To Apply For Monies Necessary For The Match Requirement Of The Department Of Justice Vest Partnership Grant Act Of 1998; To Create A Special Fund In The State Treasury To Be Designated As The Bulletproof Vests Revolving Fund; To Specify The Purpose Of The Bulletproof Vest Revolving Fund; To Establish The Schedule To Be Adhered To By Local Law Enforcement Agencies When Applying For Funds Based On Population; To Prescribe Qualifying Criteria For Eligibility Of Funds; To Authorize The Department Of Public Education To Promulgate Any Rules And Regulations Necessary For Participation In The Bulletproof Vests Revolving Fund Program; And For Related Purposes.
